thumb.title: 元気でね ～旅立つ君へ～ / 重音テト【クリスチャンEDM】
thumb.description: 【歌詞】 君と会えてよかった色々教えてくれたね君から聞いた暗い過去乗り越えていけるはずどんな夢でも叶えられるよ同じ空の下で生きているよ僕らは何があっても大丈夫さ遠くで私は祈っているよもしくじけそうになってもこの歌を思い出して心の美しいあなたには生きにくいかもだけど君との思い出 僕の宝物同じ居てくれるよくれるよだからねどうか元気でいてほしいんだこの歌にのせて君に贈るよ【English lyrics】It was truly good to meet you,You taught me so many things.The past that you've been through,I know you'll conquer, on brave wings.Any dream you hold within your heart,You can surely make it bloom.Beneath the same wide, endless sky,We're living, you and I.No matter what may come our way,We'll be alright, come what may.From afar, I'll be praying for you.And if you ever feel like falling apart,Just let this melody fill your mind.For a soul as beautiful as yours,Life's path can sometimes be unkind.Every memory I share with you,Is a treasure, more precious than gold.The same God will always be there with you,A presence, strong and true.So please, I truly wish you well, my friend,This song, I dedicate to you, until the very end.
